creator: NADA DIGITAL
descriptionHtml:
Play more, get stronger, and enjoy this charming strategic NFT game!
Protect the Slime world and get NADA TOKENS as a reward!

Participate in the AirDrop event
that celebrates the Grand Open!

Don't miss out on the chance to get 80 Nada Token by completing the tutorial after linking the Wallet Address.

■ NADA TOKEN: The NADA TOKEN will be released from NADADIGITAL Blockchain on Q1 of 2022
■ Slime NFT will be issued and become purchasable in the Q1 of 2022. (Untradable user by user)
■ NFT Market will coming soon.

Collect your own Slimes and protect the Slime World against the Dark Slime!
Be ready for the new Challenging and Adventures by Play more, get stronger with Slimes the full of charms

1) Defend the Slime world!
The more enemies are defeated, the more Orichalcum can be obtainable!
Exchange the Orichalcum
to obtain NADA TOKENS!


2) Merge the Slimes
to make them stronger!
Play with Slimes who getting stronger by merging it!
Bigger and Stronger Slimes can defend the Slime world effectively!

3) The Challenging with a variety of Slimes!

Placing the Slimes with various attributes
by strategically and defeat the enemies.
Protect the Slime World against the Dark Slime!

◈ Official Community ◈
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/slimeworld/
Discord: https://discord.gg/KFYFX4PRDE

◈ Official E-Mail ◈
slimeworld@nadadigital.co.kr

◈ Terms of Conditions ◈

title: Slime World

creator: NADA DIGITAL
descriptionHtml:
The beginning of the legend of a new and powerful slime world!

Through game play with a N Slime World
Collect your own slime and protect the Slime World from dark slime!
Prepare more for new challenges and adventures, and become stronger with charming slime.

✪ SlimeWorld NEW Updates List

● [NEW] Slime World UI
● [NEW OPEN] Infinite Mode
● [NEW OPEN] Market Place
● [NEW OPEN] PVP Arena Mode
● To celebrate the update, the attendance Event reward is UP!

✪ Introducing the game
NADA Token
- With Hedera-based blockchain-generated tokens, you can get Orihalkon through Slime World gameplay and exchange it for NADA Token!
-NADA Token is registered with GOPAX, MEXC Global and Gate.io !
-NFT Slime is on sale in the in-game NFT market.

1) PVP Arena
Join PvP Arena mode with NFTs! Of course, you can rent without NFTs!
Show everyone the power of the NFT you own!

2) Infinity mode
With a strategic random defense game, the more enemies you knock down, the more
Orihalkon you get!
Get Nada Tokens by swapping Orihalkon!

3) Merge Slime to Make It Stronger!
Play with slime that gets stronger when combined!
Larger and stronger slime can effectively defend the slime world!

4) Try various slime!
Defeat your enemies by strategically deploying slime with various properties.
Protect the Slime World from Dark Slime!

title:
Slime World
2.00.063

creator: NDP HOLDINGS
descriptionHtml:
HEDERA GUILD GAME - Slime World Major Update
Slime World is back with an exciting new look! With this major rebranding update, explore a broader world, enjoy diverse features, and experience a user-friendly interface that enhances gameplay.
We’ve also prepared welcome events for new, returning, and existing users, along with community and game-based events. Join us and dive into the fun!
✪ SlimeWorld Major Update Highlights
● MAIN UI
● Two New Minigames (Super Jump, Road Crossing)
● Roulette
● Profile System
● Friends Feature
● Chat Function
● Multi-Staking
● Three New Languages (Vietnamese, Filipino, Indonesian)
● Transition to HGG (Hedera Guild Games) Token
✪ Game Overview
HGG (Hedera Guild Game) Token
● Earn Orichalcum through gameplay and exchange it for HGG Tokens, based on Hedera's blockchain!
● The HGG Token is listed on major global exchanges like HTX, MEXC, Poloniex, GOPAX, and INDODAX, allowing for easy trade.
● Slime NFTs can be traded in the in-game NFT marketplace.

PVP Arena Mode
● If you own an NFT, showcase its power in PvP Arena Mode! Don’t have an NFT? Join with our rental system to get started.
Infinite Mode
● Battle waves of enemies in this strategic random defense game! The more enemies you defeat, the more Orichalcum you earn. Exchange Orichalcum for HGG Tokens and boost your gameplay!
Mini-Games
● Enjoy a range of mini-games in Slime World for extra fun and rewards! Each mini-game is filled with challenges to keep you entertained.
Roulette
● Spin the roulette for a chance to win rare items and resources! Become the hero of Slime World and strengthen your gameplay with these exciting rewards.
HGG Token Staking
● Experience innovation with our "Multi-Staking" service. Stake multiple assets simultaneously for diverse rewards, enjoying enhanced benefits through Slime World’s unique multi-staking offerings.
Profile, Chat, and Friends
● Customize your profile with your NFT, flags, and emblems, and express yourself in Slime World! Connect with friends and enjoy real-time chat to share strategies and build teamwork.
◈ Official Community Links
● Brand Page: https://hguild.io/
● Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hederaguildgame
● Discord: https://discord.com/invite/hederaguildgame
● Twitter: https://x.com/HederaGuildGame
● Telegram: https://t.me/HederaGuildGameCommunity
◈ Customer Support Email
● slimeworldCS@gmail.com
◈ Terms and Conditions
● https://hguild.io/front/policy/terms
◈ Privacy Policy
● https://hguild.io/front/policy/privacy
Embark on an exciting adventure with the latest Slime World update and enjoy endless fun!
